# VNChirality.right

**Case**

Indicates a right-handed pose.

## Declaration

```swift
case right
```

## Chirality Values

- **VNChirality.left**: Indicates a left-handed pose.
- **VNChirality.unknown**: Indicates that the pose chirality is unknown.

items.description: Indicates that the pose chirality is unknown.
